Package controler

Class AbstractChessGameControler

java.lang.Object
controler.AbstractChessGameControler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ChessGameControlers
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChessGameControler
public abstract class AbstractChessGameControler
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChessGameControlers
Author:
Loic and Lucas

the controller represents the DP Strategy regarding the view

common methods for the controller which consist in establishing communication between the View and the Model
